table-padding-heading.description: Header cell padding (normal variant, top right bottom left)

table-padding-heading-relaxed.description: Header cell padding (relaxed variant, top right bottom left)

table-padding-data.description: Data cell base padding (normal variant, 12px vertical for 48px height)

table-padding-data-relaxed.description: Data cell base padding (relaxed variant, top right bottom left)

table-padding-cell-text.description: Vertical padding for text-only cells in normal variant (12px for 48px height)

table-padding-cell-text-relaxed.description: Vertical padding for text-only cells in relaxed variant (20px for 64px height)

table-padding-cell-checkbox.description: Vertical padding for checkbox cells in normal variant (2px for 48px height)

table-padding-cell-checkbox-relaxed.description: Vertical padding for checkbox cells in relaxed variant (10px for 64px height)

table-padding-cell-form-field.description: Vertical padding for form field cells (input, dropdown, etc.) in normal variant (3px for 48px height)

table-padding-cell-form-field-relaxed.description: Vertical padding for form field cells (input, dropdown, etc.) in relaxed variant (11px for 64px height)

table-padding-cell-badge.description: Vertical padding for badge cells in normal variant (12px for 48px height)

table-padding-cell-badge-relaxed.description: Vertical padding for badge cells in relaxed variant (20px for 64px height)

table-padding-cell-actions.description: Vertical padding for action cells (buttons, icon buttons, links) in normal variant (7px for 48px height)

table-padding-cell-actions-relaxed.description: Vertical padding for action cells (buttons, icon buttons, links) in relaxed variant (14px for 64px height)

table-padding-cell-text-supporting-relax.description: Vertical padding for text-supporting cells in relaxed variant (8px for 64px height)

table-sort-header-gap.description: Gap between sort header text and icon
